title: Image Prompt Generation Output
description: Schema for the output of an AI image prompt generation request.

keywords.description: A list of keywords for the image. These should be simple keywords like 'girl', 'brown hair', 'outdoors', etc.

image_style.description: The style of the image to generate. Use 'photo' for realistic/photorealistic images, 'drawing' for anime/cartoon/illustrated styles, 'stylized' for artistic/3D rendered/stylized images.

negative_keywords.description: A list of keywords to exclude from the image.
